remarks: Choice-free proof of ~ ftc2 .  (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 19-Jun-2018.)
statement:
ftc2nc.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ftc2nc.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ftc2nc.le $e |- ( ph -> A <_ B ) $.
ftc2nc.c $e |- ( ph -> ( RR _D F ) e. ( ( A (,) B ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
ftc2nc.i $e |- ( ph -> ( RR _D F ) e. L^1 ) $.
ftc2nc.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( A [,] B ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
ftc2nc $p |- ( ph -> S. ( A (,) B ) ( ( RR _D F ) ` t ) _d t = ( ( F ` B ) - ( F ` A ) ) ) $.
$d A t $.
$d B t $.
$d F t $.
$d ph t $.
